member.name: IMFLocalMFTRegistration.RegisterMFTs
member.summary: Registers one or more Media Foundation transforms (MFTs) in the caller's process.
member.param: A pointer to an array of structures.
The number of elements in the pMFTs array.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Registers Media Foundation transforms (MFTs) in the caller's process.
The Media Session exposes this interface as a service. To obtain a pointer to this interface, call the method on the Media Session with the service identifier MF_LOCAL_MFT_REGISTRATION_SERVICE.
